I usually always love the more realisitc approach Nakamura Kuzuyu takes on his plots, but I feel like this one made this whole story a lot more convoluted. Like its being hinted now that The Main Character and Yukari are apparently siblings? The previous chapters made it seem like she was just some stranger that he met because of some random chance encounter. Maybe they're siblings in a metaphorical sense, but honestly I have no idea because the doujin doesn't explain it well at all. The doujin also doesn't explain very well what is happening with Yukari and her Mom. It's still a good doujin. It just has a few plot issue that make me enjoy less than the previous 2 chapters. Hopefully chapter 4 explains everything better.
